name: Tangela
flavorText:
The whole body is
swathed with wide
vines that are similar to sea­
weed. Its vines
shake as it walks.

previous.name: Chansey
previous.flavorText:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bring happiness to those
who manage to get
it.

next.name: Kangaskhan
next.flavorText:
The infant rarely
ventures out of
its mother's protective pouch
until it is 3
years old.

pokemon.name: Tangela
pokemon.flavorText:
The whole body is
swathed with wide
vines that are similar to sea­
weed. Its vines
shake as it walks.

pokemon.name: Tangrowth
pokemon.flavorText:
It ensnares prey by extending
arms made of vines. Losing arms to
predators does not trouble it.
